author: Special Correspondent
text:
Over 25 sheep were mowed down by a speeding TNSTC bus which ploughed through a herd on Madurai-Rajapalayam highway near T. Kallupatti on Sunday night.

Police said that the herd of about 300 cattle heads belonging to SR. Veerapandian and Sudhakar of Kadaneri was being guided back home after grazing when it came under the wheels of a Madurai-bound bus near T. Subbulapuram.

Kallupatti police are investigating.
title: Bus ploughs through herd; 25 sheep dead
